name: SCHEDULE II (still in development)
description:
currently in development

based on a true story

god had to nerf me

-x-

how to play:

use wasd or arrow keys (or on mobile, swipe) to move and interact.

notes on development:
  • made in bitsy for me, a version of bitsy (by Adam Le Doux) that i hacked together to better suit my needs
  • tools i used:
    • font made by me
    • bitsy merge, bitsy optimizer, and the long dialog/paragraph breaks, dialog pause, javascript dialog, and transparent sprites hacks by Sean
    • pixsy by ruin
    • Borksy by AYolland
    • Shiftsy by Brandon Thread
  • made for the YOU CAN'T HAVE IT ALL bitsy jam
